title: What is the scope of the Java programming language in the next 5 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Java is widely use for enterprise software development and it’s the basic need of software development. But as oracle had introduced the licencing with java the non- US software development will move to free languages like python, ruby, rust. So after 5 year Java is still in strong hold but new may replace java. Google had introduced Kotlin and Go lang .
